title: Bloomberg Markets: Cohen's Comeback, HPE Earnings Report
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cohen's Comeback, HPE Earnings Report
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Simone Foxman Hedge Fund Reporter Bloomberg Editorial Discussing Steve Cohen's Comeback Is Said to Begin as Marketers Pitch Fund. Officially, Steve Cohen is undecided about starting a hedge fund. Unofficially, he’s got marketers poised to sign up clients and take in money early next year. Anand Srinivasan Senior Analyst:Semiconductors & Tech Hardware Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing HPE earnings and outlook.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
